title: Amazon EventBridge Schedule to Lambda
description: Creates an EventBridge schedule to run a Lambda every 5 minutes

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project demonstrates how to use Amazon EventBridge Scheduler with Lambda to invoke a function on a schedule. This pattern uses the rate type schedule to run the Lambda function every 5 minutes.
This deploys one EventBridge rate based schedule and one Java 11 based Lambda function.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
